name: Game Of Life (itch) (Ricigeroi)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Left mouse click - change cell mode (alive/dead)
  • Right mouse click - change cell mode (infected/healthy) (iff Pandemic mode is on)
  • 'R' button - random cell positioning
  • 'C' button - clear screen from all alive cells
  • 'P' button - pause or unpause simulation process
  • Simulation speed slider establishes the simulation speed (by default = 10)
  • Number of generations allow run the simulation for a specified number of generations - after placing cells, enter the integer number in the input field and press enter, then press P or button to begin the simulation. It will stop after specified number of generations
  • Pandemic toogle - enables/disables the pandemic mode
  • Immunity Zone toogle - enables/disables the Immunity Zone mode
  • Volume  slider - contols the volume of the background song

CUSTOM RULES:

1. Pandemic mode

A pandemic mode has been added to the game, cells can be infected with a virus that spreads very quickly from one living cell to another. An infected cell can be distinguished by its characteristic red color. However, the virus does not affect the rules of reproduction. Infected cells die from the disease after 15 generations.

2. Immunity Zone

Adds a special zone that complements the pandemic mode (does not work without it). In the designated area, cells become immune to the virus if they have been in contact with an infected cell. A cell with immunity can be distinguished by its characteristic green color. Cells with immunity are more viable: if there is at least one living cell with an immune cell and the number of neighboring cells is not more than four, the cell survives until the next generation.
